title: Scientific Method and Experimental Design

vocab.definition: An educated guess that can be tested through experiments
A factor that can change in an experiment
The group in an experiment that doesn't receive the treatment being tested
A statement that explains what was learned from the experiment

teachingNotes: Emphasize the importance of fair testing and controlling variables. Practice writing hypotheses in 'if-then' format. Discuss peer review in science.

sample.question: What is an educated guess that can be tested called?

truefalse.question: A good experiment should only test one variable at a time.

multiplechoice.question: What is the group that doesn't receive treatment in an experiment?

fillintheblank.question: Information collected during an experiment is called ________.

shortanswer.question: What are the main steps of the scientific method?
